about_the_game:
Join Gyrowolf on an epic journey through space, as he journeys through the stars.

This pack includes a large variety of themes, masterfully composed to evoke emotion and action. From the nostalgic longing from abandoned cities to adrenalin-fueled villain chases, you will find the perfect piece for any occasion. Despite the overall galactic theme, many of the songs will also fit into a more classic fantasy setting.

Features:

  • Over 30 themes, spanning from cities, to battles and more.
  • Galactic music files for events (ME) including Item, Defeat and Success.
  • A Variety of sounds and intensities, something for every listening ear.

Track List:

BGM
